Elegant apothegms in the speech of Lewis IV King of France to his revolted subjects
3 p.
Printed by N. T., [London?] : 1685.
Caption title. A political satire in which Charles II and Charles I are represented by Lewis IV and his father, Charles the Simple. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
